name: Cheese Defense
description:
Protect your beloved cheese from your devil clones who try to destroy ! 

Fight the waves of clones who are coming. Beetween each waves you have 30 seconds break, but there are always more ennemies to fight.

How long are you going to survive ?

---------------------------------------------------------------------

hello everyone, we are 16 years old and we made our first game together, it is a tower defense where you need to protect your cheese from your clones who are triying to destroy your beloved cheese.

 We didn't manage to complete our game in time but we are still proud to bring you our first game "Cheese Defense" even if  many things we wanted to add are missing because with highschool it was hard to find enough time even in a week-end.       

But we hope you'll enjoy it !

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls :

Right arrow: move right                                                                                                   

Left arrow: move left

tab : switch to build mode if you are in fight mode and switch to fight mode if you are in build mode

Fight mode :

1 :  sword 

2 : gun

E : attack

Build mode :

E : build
